attributes.action: Off lead dog walking in public illegal
attributes.additional_details: This will result hopefully in less dog attacks and attacks on humans who try to intervene usually resulting in the human getting hurt themselves . A law passed would deter hopefully the mindless owners who have no regard for nervous dogs and owners who feel frightened and let down by authorities , namely the police who very rarely do any thing about these things happening as it is often difficult to trace owners after they leave the scene,
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to pass a law please due to a lot of recent attacks on dogs which are on leads which are then attacked , mauled and resulting in some cases the death of family pets, making it illegal for owners to walk dogs off lead.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make it mandatory for all dogs to be on leads in public places.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710271
